EuroVM Debutes with Unlimited Bandwidth VMs in the Netherlands!

almere, cheap vps, eurovm, HostSlim, lelystad, netherlands, nvme September 5, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

EuroVM is presenting their first offer.  They’re a HostSlim brand that’s been in operation since 2008 with over 10,000 clients.

  • Get a 1GB VM with Unmetered Bandwidth in the Netherlands for only EUR 4.95/month!

That’s a nice price for unlimited bandwidth on a cheap vps.  They’re using NVMe equipment with 10Gbps uplinks.

EuroVM is registered in the Netherlands (52966887). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept iDeal, Wire, BitCoin, Credit Cards.

Here’s a little about EuroVM in their own words:

“We focus on providing high-quality NVMe VPS hosting services from our two tier 3 data center inside a telecom & data tower in Lelystad and Almere, The Netherlands. From day one, we’ve always centered our business around our clients. By choosing us, you receive and can expect unparalleled support and service levels. EuroVM is a daughter company of HostSlim that was founded in late 2008 and has grown into one of the larger hosting providers in the Netherlands, serving over 10.000 clients.”

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!

VPS Starter

  • 1 Intel® Xeon® core
  • 1024 MB RAM
  • 25 GB NVMe
  • Unmetered Bandwidth (1Gbps)
  • 1x IPv4 + IPv6
  • KVM Virtualization
  • Daily Backups
  • DDoS Protection
  • Data Protection (European Law)
  • Coupon: LEBNVME
  • EUR 4.95/month
  • [ORDER in Lelystad DC]
  • [ORDER in Almere DC]
